applepromotionconten.description: *Price and Visa Reward Card offers are available to new residential customers who use 1,500 Ccf per year or less, enrolling with Ohio Natural Gas between {{currentMonthFirstDay}} and {{currentMonthLastDay}} using applicable promotion code; Visa Reward Card offer available only for such customers enrolling online at www.onlyong.com/SCORE3V. ONG service is available for eligible customers participating in the Ohio Choice program through Vectren Energy Delivery of Ohio. ONG rates do not include taxes or local utility charges. For more information regarding terms and conditions, call 1.800.970.3143, write to Ohio Natural Gas, P.O. Box 14657, Cleveland, OH 44114, or visit onlyong.com. Early termination charges will apply for residential fixed price plans (12-Month plan: $150/$75). Customer must have continuous active service with Ohio Natural Gas for at least 60 days to be eligible to receive the reward card. After reaching eligibility, please allow 4-6 weeks for delivery. Visa Reward Card is issued by and is the property of CenterState Bank of Florida, NA pursuant to a license from Visa U.S.A. Inc. and is subject to the issuer's terms and conditions. Reward Cards will not have cash access and can be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted. All trademarks noted herein are held by their respective owners. Cannot be combined with any other offer. ƗPrice comparison claim based on PUCO Apples-to-Apples website published 12-month fixed prices as of 03/01/2018 and ONG's March 2018 12-month direct mail price offer.
applepromotionconten.heading: Special Bonus: Enroll online and receive a {{giftCardValue | currency:"$":0}} Visa® Reward Card!*
